name: tsula, ghost of the desert (demo)
description:
my very first game, so be gentle! explore a desert of wandering spirits as tsula, a fox searching for the four feathers needed to transform and break free of the dream realm. thanks for playing!

programming, art, design: Matteo Potenza

music: Ian Crossman [instragam @hunkfunk]

source and assets:

https://github.com/casseroleplaying/tsula
